bike.description: Alpha Platinum Aluminum, butted & hydroformed tubing, E2 tapered head tube, internal cable routing, press fit BB, balanced post mount, Closed Convert dropouts, G2 Geometry

components.description: RockShox Reba RL w/Solo Air spring, rebound, Motion Control remote lockout, E2 tapered steerer, 15mm Maxle Lite, custom G2 Geometry w/51mm offset, 100mm travel
Bontrager sealed cartridge bearing center lock hubs, 15mm alloy axle front, 142x12 alloy axle rear w/Bontrager Mustang 28-hole Tubeless Ready rims
Bontrager Race Lite Low Riser, 31.8mm, 5mm rise
FSA IS-2, E2, sealed cartridge bearing
